hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select EOFO.EOFO_TOTAL_AMOUNT, EOFO.EOFO_IS_HAVE_CHARGEOFF, EOFO.EOFO_IS_HAVE_BILL, EOFO.EOFO_IS_RECONCILIATION, EOFO.EOFO_FEE_COMFIRM_STATUS_CODE, EOFO.EOFO_ID from EO_FEE_MANAGEMENT_ORDER EOFO where 1=1 AND EOFO.EOFO_FEE_COMFIRM_STATUS_CODE!='FEE_REPEAL_STATUS'/*过滤掉撤销状态的费用*/ <<AND EOFO.EOFO_PARTY_CODE LIKE :eofoPartyCode>> <<AND EOFO.EOFO_PARTY_NAME LIKE :eofoPartyName>> <<AND EOFO.EOFO_RP_FLAG_CODE LIKE :eofoRpFlagCode>> <<AND (EOFO.EOFO_IS_HAVE_CHARGEOFF is NULL OR EOFO.EOFO_IS_HAVE_CHARGEOFF=:eofoIsHaveChargeoff)>> <<AND EOFO.ORG_ID=:orgId>>
